divs: Sighting DetailsI witnessed a small white object travel NE and made no noise. I took pictures as I observed this at 7:20 pm yesterday evening. I went back inside and came out 10 minutes later and also observed a strange cloud-like formation which I also took a picture of. I would be glad to send you the pictures so you could possibly enhance or enlarge them. You may have to enlarge the pictures to see the object which I have attempted to center in each picture.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bogue Chitto
This sighting has never been favorited.
